original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2502)@</color>  武將召喚七顆守護星辰，當武將體力歸零時，回復35%的體力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2502)@</color> The military commander summons seven guardian stars. When the military commander's physical strength is zero, he will recover 35% of his physical strength .
